wikipedia_page.main: Marcus Jones (born 24 June 1974) is an English former footballer who played as a defender in the Football League. He made only two Football League appearance for Cheltenham Town He had spent the vast majority of his career in non league football with teams like Yeovil Town, Northwich Victoria, Scarborough and Telford United.

response: *Marcus Jones (cornerback) (born 1998), College football player, University of Houston

*Marcus Jones (politician) (born 1974), MP for Nuneaton, Warwickshire, England
